extendedInfo.description: Sign documents and get signatures quickly and easily from your Android device. A must-have app that will save you time and eliminate the need to print, fax or mail documents and forms for signature. Once you've tried it, you'll wonder how you ever got along without it!* Featured in USA Today, WSJ, TechCrunch, LifeHacker, Ubergizmo ** Rated a Top Productivity Tablet App * * Featured App by AT&T, HTC, and Motorola *Safe, secure and legally binding, DocuSign empowers you to sign documents and get signatures from anyone, anywhere, whether they happen to be standing right next to you or are halfway around the globe. DocuSign is the most widely used eSignature platform, trusted by more than 40 million people who have DocuSigned in 188 countries around the world.Already have a DocuSign account? No problem; DocuSign's Mobile Application allows you to access your current account on the go. HUNDREDS OF WAYS TO USE DOCUSIGN INK â¢	Send contracts, invoices and work orders for signature.â¢	Sign school forms and permission slips.â¢	Sign and fill out insurance forms (health, renters, home, auto, personal . . . )â¢	Review and approve project estimates, POs and change orders.â¢	Sign lease and rental agreements.â¢	Authorize direct deposit and change of address.â¢	Sign your new-job offer letter and paperwork.â¢	Find solutions for every department: HR, finance, sales, purchasing, legal. Key FeaturesSIGN You can sign any document for FREE directly from your device; no pen or paper required. Supports multiple formats (PDF, images, Microsoft documents and more.) â¢	Fill out forms and templates. â¢	Create and adopt a signature (multiple color and formats.)â¢	Access and import documents from multiple sources.â¢	Complete face-to-face signing with multiple signers.â¢	Import documents directly from email.SENDYou can electronically send documents for signature and manage the documents you send. â¢	Send documents to multiple people to sign.â¢	Complete face-to-face signing with multiple signers.â¢	No more printing, scanning, or faxing send requests for signature and completed document directly from the app (email, Evernote, Box, Google drive, and more.)  â¢	Get notified when documents have been signed and completed.â¢	Receive five free sends when you sign up!STORE Access and store all your files & documents instantly and securely.â¢	Store files for free (signed documents automatically store in the cloud). â¢	Save completed documents to your Dropbox, Google Drive, Evernote, Box or Salesforce account.â¢	Open signed documents in other applications. SECURE Choose the solution trusted by banks and law firms. Get enterprise-grade security in the palm of your hand.â¢	Legally binding; complies with the eSign Act.â¢	Complete audit trail; see who signed when and where.â¢	Documents are encrypted; more secure than paper.â¢	Only eSignature app that tamper-proofs documents.â¢	DocuSign eSignature platform is ISO 27001 SSAE16-compliant.MANAGE YOUR ONLINE IDENTITYâ¢	Create your personal eSignature (multiple color and formats). â¢	Customize ID card; photo, name, title, company, address, phone number.â¢	Customize privacy settings.WORKS WITHâ¢	PDFâs, Word Documents, Images, PDF Forms, Templates â¢	Import and Export from Evernote, Box, Dropbox, Google Driveâ¢	DocuSign Personal, Professional, Workgroup, and Real Estate plans.Support DocuSign is available for: Desktop, Tablet and mobile devicesMobile platforms: Android, iOS and Windows 8Web: Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Internet ExplorerSupported accessories: HTC Scribe PenMore information about eSignature and ESIGN compliance: http://www.docusign.com/company/customer-partner-trustLearn more: http://www.docusign.com/products/docusignink/hiw-android

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Quick, competent, capable.  Excellent and suggested app for anyone who needs to sign anything, anytime.
reviews.author: Jeffrey Smay

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: I really like that I can upload the document from my email, sign and send without any issues. I am glad I dont have to jump thru a bunch if hoops!!!
reviews.author: Robin Howard

reviews.title: Samsung grand: Now this sh!t acting a fool too !!!!
reviews.comment: Trying to install on my phone, say installing but will not change to installed
reviews.author: Sha Jen

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Excellent product as I work for military I frequently have forms to complete and having ability to complete via email from me cellphone Is a great help! Paperless is great!
reviews.author: Tyler Desmarais

reviews.title: Life Saver
reviews.comment: Im buying a new home, and Docusign has saved me countless trips to the fax machine, which is to big to carry in my pocket...but my Samsung Note II isn\'t. ...This app is the best app out there...thank you
reviews.author: SuperShaunwhite

reviews.title: Great!!!
reviews.comment: This is the best app. I have weekly reports that I must sign & send in. This app allows me to do my paperwork without having to download & print the papers then sign & fax them in. I love this app!!!
reviews.author: Donna Millermcnutt

reviews.title: Load of rubbish!
reviews.comment: Typical,  but right when I need to urgently sign a document while away.  It looks like it works until you view the pdf in Adobe or another pdf viewer.  My signature is a black box it is not even legible. Tried this to view the signed doc in several pdf viewers and they all look different,  mostly not legible,  or has a blue box behind the signature.  Not good.  Certainly wouldn\'t pay to use this for anything important.
reviews.author: Chris Sefton

reviews.title: I\'ve been waiting for this
reviews.comment: Finally an app to something much needed, and quite well I might add!
reviews.author: Alejandro Erickson

reviews.title: Not so secure at all
reviews.comment: First it\'s not compliant with local law in terms of signature validity. Secondly it has hardly ANYTHING in common with actual digital signature, rather graphical representation of you signature copy.  May be good for America but not for Europe.
reviews.author: Piotr WYSOCKI

reviews.title: Great application
reviews.comment: Easy to use.  Use it regularly in my real estate business
reviews.author: Anthony M Fraser

reviews.title: Incredible app!
reviews.comment: Works way better than hello sign.
reviews.author: Jason Wooddy

reviews.comment: Very cool and I recommend. Though scrolling through the dic is a bit of a problem., even on big screen of galaxy note 2.
reviews.author: Habib Seraji

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Easy to use and its great. Saved me a ton of time and Hassle. Saved me a ton of money on printing too. I had to get some important paperwork signed and emailed asap and I found this app. So easy to set up. Super awesome.
reviews.author: Erin Fleming

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: This app is so awesome. Signing documents, so easy, so quick. No longer need to print, sign, scan and then send. Just awesome. If your always on the road like me but but take the office with you then this is the only thing your missing.
reviews.author: Adrian Newman

reviews.title: Wow!
reviews.comment: I was amazed how easy & fast this was too use,
reviews.author: Linda Tenny

reviews.comment: Excellent app. Very handy!
reviews.author: Nevaeh Heaven

reviews.title: Very good service and app...
reviews.comment: Ever needed to sign a letter or form on the go, if yes then this is the service for you.
reviews.author: Phil Sainter

reviews.title: Saves time works so well!
reviews.comment: I love this app probably my favorite!
reviews.author: Christopher Barney

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: This is amazing and makes life so much easier on the go.  Samsung galaxy note 2
reviews.author: Craig Havlinek

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: I thought it would be a bit more involved...always annoying.  But, it was very easy to use and I worried for nothing.
reviews.author: 3Babybugz
